name: Flora Carnivora Eau de Parfum with Jasmine + Tuberose
about: Fragrance Family: Fresh..Scent Type: Fresh Florals..Key Notes: Jasmine, Tuberose, Orange Blossom..Fragrance Description: This distinctive and sophisticated blend of tuberose and jasmine perfume, complimented by bright orange blossom, is a testament to a fresh floral fragrance...About the Bottle: Henry Rose crafted their bottles to be genderless, modern, and minimal. Their 50ml bottles are made from 90% recycled glass,  caps are made from fully compostable soy resin, and cartons are made from biodegradable FSC hemp paper...About the Fragrance: u201cFlora Carnivora was` formulated with unexpected proportions, leading to a new interpretation of a genderless floral. I wanted to create a contrasted scent that was powerful yet soft, carnal yet creamy and invent a new era of gender-inclusive perfumery that heres to stay.u201d u2013 Celine Barel perfumer..All Henry Rose fragrances are EWG Verified, Cradle to Cradle Certified, and Leaping Bunny Certified Cruelty-Free...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.

reviews.review_title: One of the only floral perfume I like
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a discovery set from this line and fell in love with this particular scent. It's warm and cozy with the Jasmine, Neroli,  orange blossoms and musk being the most prominent notes for me. This perfume actually relaxes me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually go for warm woodsy scents like Maison Louis Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt. I first purchased Henry Rose Queens and Monsters because of the warm sandalwood notes. I love knowing that I am wearing a clean fragrance that wont give myself nor anyone around me a headache. I smelled this scent in store just out of curiousity and because I ended up loving Queens and Monsters. I am not typically a floral perfume fan, but the musky base notes in this fragrance balance out the jasmine and tuberose beautifully. This scent is creamy, yet fresh. I have been reaching for it over all my other fragrances. My bf told me I smell u201cangelicu201d. So there you have it. Longevity for me is roughly 5 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: I don't like any florals.  They all give me a headache, and a 400 dollar price tag doesn't fix it either.  If the scent isn't clean, I can tell, and I don't like it.  So Henry Rose's fragrances have been a win for me.  This is my 3rd favorite. (Queens and Torn are my first and second).  This scent is not a typical floral.  It is a balanced sweet nectar with depth.  Delectable notes combine to create a symphony of fragrances.  I am getting honey, a bit of coconut and vanilla, jasmine musk.  Outstanding gourmand floral.

reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, I'm going to have to return this perfume. since I got it and noticed that it's been used. Aside from this, this is one of my favorite fragrances. is very light fresh, and it has become my go-to for every day wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: THE ANSWER IS YES!!!  This fragrance is floral with a little musk. It smells amazing. It lasts all day. I was afraid to purchase the large bottle but once the travel size runs out ill be back

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This might just be my favourite perfume. I started with the Henry Rose sample set and actually skipped over this scent because I'm typically not into purely floral perfumes. Something made me revisit my sample later on and I decided to try it out in earnest. Long story short, I quickly used up my sample and bought a travel size. I then used up my travel size and here I am with the full size. This is truly a floral scent for people who don't like floral perfumes. It's very light, very fresh, a little sweet but not too sweet, and has a slight musk underneath to give it some depth. I've only worn it in warm weather so far but I think it can be warn into winter as well. To me, it just smells like a fresh bouquet with a hint of depth and no one flower (I'm looking at you, jasmine) overpowers the others. It is balanced beautifully. It's what I want it a light fresh scent, without smelling like clean laundry or citrus.   I also love the transparency of the brand and the simple, modern looking bottle. Finally, given that it's a clean perfume I wouldn't say it lasts all day but I do smell it for several hours and we also have to be mindful we may go nose blind so I think others may still be able to smell it even if we can't. I don't mind if the projection is a little softer and closer to the skin, anyway.  This has definitely become a staple in my collection and I would recommend trying it out even if you aren't traditionally a floral person.

reviews.review_title: Finished my first whole bottle, will be reordering
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have officially finished my bottle of Flora Carnivora since first purchasing it 2-ish months ago. I stumbled across this scent randomly in Sephora just over 2 months ago and had sprayed a bit on my wrist after smelling it in the store and liking it, but wanting to see how long it lasted. I could still smell it on my skin after 24 hours and couldn't get it out of my head so had to purchase it for summer. It's such a fresh, feminine scent. I work full time in a corporate job, I have a toddler - I want products that I don't have to constantly reapply and help me look polished, clean, and put together. This scent certainly delivered!   I'm also a fan of YSL Black Opium, The One, and Chanel Chance (pink). If you are looking for a scent that isn't overpowering but also holds all day and is feminine and clean - this is your scent!

reviews.review_text: I am a never smelled it but I'm always willing to try a perfume that has a great rating and I only read the real people who were not given a free sample. I got it 2 days ago and opened it and was so happy! It was just as described. It reminded me of being 4 years old and my Daddy walking me up to the corner to a giant honeysuckle Bush and popping off a flower and pulling the center out and letting me lick it. It tasted like heaven and smelled this way a also. I don't know if the rumours are true that this perfume was created for and by Michele Phiffer but if they are true, she should step forward and let us all know what her process was with Henry Rose. I am not anyone who received anything free. I was just excited for Sephora's 20% off of 1 perfume. I went for the big bottle. So happy I did.

reviews.review_title: Smells beautiful, but the bottle is not that great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was an impulse buy. I'm usually not overly fond of floral smells, but this smells lovely. It is pretty strong right out of the bottle, and if you're particularly sensitive to smells, just a friendly heads up. It takes a bit to mellow out and not be overwhelming. However, the bottle- at least mine- was really crappy. The silver bit at the neck, pulled off and got stuck in the lid cap. And because of that, it leaked. EVERYWHERE. So now my coat smells like a floral massacre. Which is why I took away two stars. One removed for the flimsy nature of the bottle, and one more for the amount that leaked out.  I'd recommend it, but just be aware you may receive an imperfect, leak prone bottle.

reviews.review_title: Childhood Memory of Honeysuckles - in love
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think I may have finally found my signature scent after spending a year searching. This perfume apparently was created by Michelle Pfeiffer because she wanted to replicate the a smell of a neighbors lush flower garden from her childhood. Likewise, this perfume evokes childhood memories for me as well. It reminds me of when I used to pick honey suckles as a child in summer time, surrounded by greenery, the humidity of the south east enhancing all the smells in the most incredible way. Im picky when it comes to floral perfumes, I usually find them to be too much. Too heady. Too loud. This perfume feels like my memory of picking honey suckles was placed in a bottle. That lovely memory returns to me every time I wear floral Carnivora. It is purely and simply beautiful. Its starts out as an extremely realistic musky white floral but in a soft and extremely lovely and approachable way, then starts to turn a bit green, and settles into the smell of white musk and honey after several hours of wear. The projection and longevity is impressive for a clean perfume. Its definitely meant for spring and especially summer, but Im tempted to wear it in all seasons because I love it that much. If you are a fan of more complex florals, this perfume isnt for you. Its beauty is easily understood, its classic in a down to earth way. Michelle and Henry rose have found themselves a life long customer.

Otherwise its a nice scent that doesnt smell like your grandmas perfume.

First off the bottle is simple and very nice. The scent is soft, an elegant floral but feels fresh and easy going. I love this scent for the current spring season. Good for an everyday wear. I received this complimentary from Henry Rose.

I picked this scent because I love Jasmine but I felt like I couldn't smell much of it. It is still a great scent nonetheless.  TOP Notes: Orangeflower Water Absolute Tunisia, Neroli Blanc MIDDLE Notes: Jasmine Absolute Sambac, Tuberose Accord BOTTOM Notes: Cedarwood Texas, Vetiver Oil Haiti, Opulent Musks, Amber

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Henry Rose gifted me this product. This perfume has a very nice floral scent. When I use this perfume it brings back good memories. It reminds me of the flower garden I had at my grandmother's house. It is sweet and smooth at the same time. The smell is very pleasant for me. And throughout the day the smell gets even better, I can't describe it. I'm loving this smell so much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Im not the biggest fan of floral fragrances because they normally give me headaches, can be overpowering, or remind me of my grandma. But this one is an exception. This perfume is a lovely warm floral scent. Its not overwhelming but lasts a long time on my skin. I also really like the minimalistic packaging. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love CLEAN brands that hags safe formulas and are transparent about the ingredients they use. Michelle Pfeiffer did such an amazing job with Henry Rose! Flora Carnivora is such a unique fragrance!! Its definitely a fresh floral but also has hints of earthiness to it that makes this unisex fragrance stand out of the crowd! It yields expensive and lux!! The wear time isnt great (4hours max) but I dont mind it cause its a CLEAN perfume with safe ingredients and thats a priority for me :) Gifted by Henry Rose for my honest opinion after testing it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this perfume. Smells amazing and what I love the most is that hours and hours later I can still feel the scent in me, If I applied it at night I can definitely feel the scent next morning! Loved it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a floral perfume with a hint of flora, this is the one for you. It smells sophisticated so it is the perfect scent for a work or a night out. The packaging is also cute. gifted by henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry Rose. This is my favorite sent by Henry Rose so far, to me its floral with a subtle sweetness and the scent is subtle enough for daytime wear and equally sophisticated enough for date night. I think the perfume bottle its self is great too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry Rose. One of the things I love about this perfume is that it has a long-lasting scent that lingers throughout the day. It's not overpowering, but rather subtle and pleasant, making it perfect for daily wear. Additionally, the bottle is beautifully designed, making it a lovely addition to any perfume collection.  Overall, I would highly recommend the Floral perfume to anyone who loves a light and refreshing floral scent that lasts all day. Whether you're going to work, a special event, or just running errands, this perfume is sure to make you feel confident, beautiful, and feminine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Flora Carnivora is a fresh, floral forward fragrance. It feels sophisticated and has a lot of depth and plays well with floral and earthy, woody notes This fragrance smells very real to me, as if I was actually smelling a bouquet or garden of real flowers. It has notes of jasmine, tuberose, orange blossom, vetiver, cedar wood and musk. I like this, but dont love it as I often reach for other florals than this one. I tend to like sweeter florals, but can appreciate an earthy floral when Im in the mood for it. The bottle is minimal and genderless. Complimentary from Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am ridiculously obsessed with this scent.  I have tried some of the others from Henry Rose and this is by far my favorite.  It's a rich floral with Jasmine and Orange Blossom which cuts some of the sweetness.  I have at least 10 perfumes and this is my new favorite.  More of a winter scent, as I wouldn't call it light.  Divine.  Gifted by Henry Rose but my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume! Almost all of my perfumes are florals, but this one is a little earthier and muskier so super unique to any other floral I own. I love wearing this perfume at night- it still feels young and sweet, but has a bit more edge to it. I am so grateful that I received this complimentary from Henry Rose!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this scent from the first spray.  Flora Carnivora has easily become one of my absolute favorites. It has a beautiful, light floral scent.  I also layered it with Jakes House and they compliment each other wonderfully.  I would recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really beautiful floral scent, perfect for spring or summer. It feels so fun and flirty! I put it on in the morning and feel like it lasts pretty strongly for about half the day, longer than the other perfumes I have at the moment.  I received this complimentary from Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Flora Carnivora is one of my favorite fragrances. If you have ever been to Hawaii, you will know what  talking about when I say it smells exactly like it. And, if you havent been, you get a sense of what is smells like. Tuberose is one of my favorite notes. This was gifted by Henry Rose but my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Floral, earthy & fresh. This is such a gorgeous, everyday scent for summer. I love the floral notes and wears well throughout the day. More u201cgrown upu201d for those transitioning out of the overly sweet/floral scents. It last about 5 hours which is typical for me. Its complex, addicting and does smell like a bouquet of flowers. Wished it lasted a bit longer though. u2014 Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry Rose I really love this sent I think that its a very floral an absolutely beautiful I do smell a hint of masculine in this sent after it dries down, but I absolutely love it. I think that it is so wonderfully paired together all of the notes fit perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Flora Carnivora is my favorite Henry Rose fragrance, and I do not typically go for floral scents.  I think I am drawn to it because it is an earthy floral. It is light, delicate, and clean.  Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Henry Rose for review. I love floral feminine fragrances, and this has a beautiful prominent notes of sweet jasmine and tuberose. It dries down to an elegant musky amber and a few spritzes last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I work at the office and always wear perfume and am so excited Ive found my new favorite scent! This Henry Rose perfume is amazing, it is so unique and I receive lots of compliments every time I wear it. The aroma is fresh, long lasting, and not overpowering. I am so glad I was gifted by Henry Rose in exchange to my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If your obsessed with floral scents like I am, this is the scent for you. It smells like summer in all the best ways. I love how this perfume is the only one Ive ever been complimented on by both sexes! This is a must have!  Gifted by Henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really beauty scent that is sophisticated and warm. It is floral and warm, and would be perfect to wear to an event or summer dinner / drinks. It makes me feel like I am the main character and leaves a lingering scent. Really love how long lasting it is too! Gifted by henry rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Though I dont typically love floral fragrances - this is a big exception! It was kindly gifted by Henry Rose and I so enjoy it. Its an intriguing floral with a slight warmth and feels good as a year round scent but Ill be partial to using it as we transition into fall!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful floral scent.  Long lasting fragrance that lasts throughout the day.  I spray the product in the mornings, and it is nice for everyday wear.  Unique warm scent, with hints of jasmine.  Makes me feel very feminine!  Elegant sturdy bottle, that is nice for display.  I received this complimentary from Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent BLEW ME AWAY. I am so obsessed - its such a beautiful floral but somehow feels like it still has some edge to it. My new favorite go to perfume for sure. & bonus, packaging it stunning.   Gifted by Henry rose

I cant believe how amazing this Eau de Parfum from Henry Rose is. I tried Flora Carnivora and I love the way it smells! It is long lasting throughout the day and love that it is a true floral scented Parfum! Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Henry Rose. The Flora Carnivora Eau De Parfum has a warm floral scent that is earthy. When I wear this perfume, I feel both powerful and soft from the lovely jasmine, tuberose, and orange blossom notesu2014a beautiful and luxurious perfume bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably one of the most alluring, floral scents Ive tried, it is multidimensional and really goes beyond your basic sweet florals, definitely a great fragrance ffor a night out. Its not particularly long-lasting, maybe three hours, but still worth it. Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Henry Rose Flora Carnivora perfume and I loved it sooo much. The scent is very flower forward but it dries down to a really unique, sexy scent that is kinda hard to pinpoint. I feel like the scent lasted a pretty decent amount of time on me before I reapplied. (About half the day) I am a big fan of this scent and have worn it every day since I got it. I received this complimentary from Henry Rose.

reviews.review_title: Sweet lightweight floral for everyday use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Henry Rose and became an instant fan of of Flor Carnivora. Its a floral fragrance that is sweet but still manages to be lightweight enough for everyday use. The staying power is amazing, it can stay all day with almost no fading. The bottle is minimalist but also so pretty. Im proud to display it on my vanity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Flora Carnivora EDP I was gifted by Henry Rose is an absolutely stunning combination of jasmine, tuberose, and orange flower. Not only is it perfect for spring and summertime, its also a clean scent. I always get compliments when I wear this out and about!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my goodness. I really tried to like it but I just couldnt. It smells very mature and a little bit rancid. You have to have very very particular taste to really enjoy this one. I am not a fan at all. Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Of the Henry Rose collection I have tried, this is for sure the most feminine. I really like how even though it is floral, it still is definitely unisex. I can definitely see this on so many different people. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Henry Rose. A sweet, soft fragrance that is light enough to wear daily. The scent is definitely floral and it leans towards jasmine but its not over powering. The bottle is also really beautiful and looks sleek and sophisticated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted complimentary from Henry Rose. I love this fragrance. Its a beautiful, light floral scent. Not only does the scent smell great, but this fragrance lasts all day for me without needing reapplying. I highly recommend this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOWS. Im a floral fragrance girl and this knocked it out of the park for me. It smells as if i just came out of a garden (which I love). It makes me feel dainty, sweet and feminine all at the same time. This was gifted by Henry Rose but the love is real

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this perfume. It is a floral scent. It is a great Spring time perfume. The combination of jasmine and orange blossoms are just beautiful. It is not overpowering and is long lasting. I definitely recommend it. Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I smelled this perfume and immediately fell in love with it. Even though I don't normally go for floral perfumes, but this one is very, very pretty. It smells so incredible. Usually when I wear perfumes, they fade so quickly throughout the day but this lasted me all day. This would make an excellent everyday scent. I cant say how much I love the smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most flattering perfume I have ever worn. Its so floral but light, its not overbearing like some fragrances I have tried. The jasmine and neroli work so well together and the hint of orangeblossom makes it the perfect everyday scent. This will be my new go-to perfume. I cant wait to try other scents from Henry Rose. This product was gifted to me by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this scent!! I have been looking for a staple scent for going out at night and this is the perfect scent. My fiance loves it and so do i! Its not super overpowering but it lingers for a long time! Gifted by Henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Henry rose! I love this perfume! The packaging is very minimal which is amazing because I love to display my perfumes! Its a very elegant yet sturdy bottle! And the smell is lovely! Its a sweet smell that is very nostalgic but I cant put my finger on exactly what, it almost smells like going to the mall in the early 2000s in the best way, like walking past the nice perfume stands. I wear it alone when I want a sweet and flirty scent and layer it with Torn, for a sweet and clean/sultry kind of scent! Absolutely love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this gifted by Henry Rose. This is such a lovely scent. Its not overpowering and sits super nice on the skin. It has a really pretty floral scent and I got compliments wearing it.  If you are into florals you will really like this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful floral fragrance. It is very light really addicting and has a really great longevity. I think it is really coming in and really young and has great projection. I have been loving this so much. Gifted by Henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A stunning fragrance! Its floral and earthy with a slightly sweet touch. Its not an overpowering fragrance, it wears quite softly on my skin with just one spritz which makes it perfect for everyday wear. This product was complimentary from Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Henry rose gifted me their fragrance in Flora Carnivora and I love it. It is a warm and floral scent. It has notes of jasmine, tuberose, orange blossom and vetiver. Such a wonderful scent! It smells so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Flora Carnivora Parfum by Henry rose is a lightly fresh and airy fragrance that is floral but also smells fresh. I like that the scent lingers all day without reapplying its not overpowering but you can definitely smell it throughout the day. Gifted by Henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry Rose   I received this perfume as exchange of my honest opinion.   Flora Carnivora is one of the most exquisite perfumes Ive tried. First thing I noticed as soon as I open this perfume is the incredible floral scent. So gorgeous! Scent lasts long; doesnt fade quick and its perfect for any occasion.   Henry Rose is not your traditional perfume! Its beyond that! Clean, fresh and sophisticated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I quite not understand this scent yet but I surely see some uniqueness in it. I was hoping it to be more flowery and warm instead I dont feel anything flowery but lots of warmth and another notes I couldnt detect.  Maybe its just not my scent, coz other fragrances from Henry rose I find more attractive. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_title: The perfect mix of Jasmine & Orange Blossom!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect fragrance for spring and summer! The mixture of Jasmine and Orange Blossom smells amazing and produces a beautiful and fresh warm floral scent! Its a very long lasting formula and has a very sophisticated scent! I was gifted by Henry Rose and this is by far my favorite floral fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this scent. Ive never smelled a gender neutral scent before but this makes complete sense to me. Its light and airy yet warm and comforting. I can really get more sense of Jasmine than anything else but love it. Its great both any gender. Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is very beautiful not very fresh, floral and sexy, perfect for evening date, in love at first try.  The bottle is also very aesthetically looking, a good perfume for my collection, I recommend it. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: Gifted by henry rose!   Wearing Flora Carnivora will make you feel empowered and confident, as the unique blend of notes is both alluring and mysterious. It's a perfect choice for a night out or any occasion where you want to leave a lasting impression.  Overall, I highly recommend Flora Carnivora to anyone looking for a standout fragrance that captures the essence of sensuality and adventure. It's a true masterpiece from Henry Rose, and one that you won't want to miss!

reviews.review_title: I was waiting for more flowery scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so exited to try this one and at this moment I am sad coz its unfortunately nothing near what I was expected from this beautiful fragrance.  Ti me they are too rich and too warm.  Sadly nothing like flowers but its only my opinion.  Meanwhile its not my style they are long lasting so great plus for quality. complimentary from henryrose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im obsessed with the beautiful warm floral scent with earthy notes too of the gifted by Henry Rose Carnivora and its my new everyday signature scent! I find myself sniffing my wrists to inhale the relaxing scent. Its a versatile scent that works for the daytime and nighttime as well. Its a scent like Ive never smelled before and cant get enough of this perfume. I also love that the Henry Rose company is clean company so I feel good using it. It truly is a beautiful scent that Im going to be gifting to my friends and family for birthdays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Henry Rose. Has very lovely floral notes, but it is a light scent, and not overpowering. The scent last a long time and get lots of compliments when I wear it. It has a sophisticated blend of notes. I recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells really really nice! I had never tried this brand and had the opportunity to try it out as a gift and I loved it! I have already gotten questions on what perfume I am wearing and the husband likes it too. I was gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This one smells very rosy and floral. It is very soft but kinda grows on you later. It even smells good after it settles in. You will love it if you like floral scents. My fav from the collection Gifted by henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great! Is it my favorite floral perfume but its up there. Has great staying power. Wish the bottle was cuter. I know its supposed to be unisex but it could be more creative. Gifted by Henry rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume was gifted by Henry Rose in exchange for a honest review. Floral scents are my go tos and this one is divine. Its a good balance of floral and clean. Received compliments while wearing it and it lasts all day.
